{ NEWS ABOUT HOYLAND APRIL 5TH 1985 Award Winners Sharon Fletcher,Andrew Oldfield, Michelle Hadfield,Scott Hoyland, Mathew Green,Simon Shield,and Victoria Noble.Cycling proficiency award winners at Hoyland King Street School.
{ Hoyland Roundabout Residents of Hoyland will no doubt be glad to hear that Hoyland Town Plan is finally being brought out for consideration by Barnsley Council. Councillors hope that the plan will bring better employment opportunities to the area which are badly needed despite the declining population ( plan area) over the past decade.
